results.content: It was a nice and concise with the content. Definitely learned more about CSS than I did before.

results.content: Amazing projects. Finally I found a course making real examples.
results.content_html: Amazing projects. Finally I found a course making real examples.

results.content: The trainer explains one by one. I like it very much. I liked the language of expression well. I think this training contributed a lot to me. I liked it in general.
results.content_html: The trainer explains one by one. I like it very much. I liked the language of expression well. I think this training contributed a lot to me. I liked it in general.

results.content: I just finished the course, everything was clear and well-explained. The best part is the projects. Every example is inspirational and practical. There is nothing too basic that we can find on any css tutorial web pages. I have learned also different css approaches that I never used before. Some points could be slower but overall I highly recommend it.

results.content: Just ok to this course. It is hard to remember what I have learnt from the beginning. Teacher has sent me the answer from his github..then suddently it is gone and havent fully answered my question. There is no answers from this video so this will cost you plenty of time to search what you have wrong. For me it is very annoying to scrollback to video to see what I have missed. I have found out that I loose motivations to study to this course. Teacher doesnt explain detaily in every code. Anyway, I learn somehow some cool CSS animation. If you are using Firefox developer you need to add min-height: 100vh. Feedback to teacher is to inform student in every new video if she/he shall keep the code or do a new one.

response.content: Hi Oshedhe, I'm sorry if you've had a bad experience and I missed your last question. I hope you're not punishing the course for that :) For your other reasons: each video is an average of 5 minutes and they are independent projects. It's unreasonable that saying it's hard to remember what you have learned at the beginning. There are only 2 sections you should keep in mind during the course and there is nothing that I haven't mentioned in the videos. Really surprised to see this for the highest-rated animation course. Thanks for your feedback.
